verbose_text: As discussed briefly above, low intracellular cholesterol levels trigger SREBP2 activation and subsequent regulation of cholesterol synthesis, uptake, and efflux to restore homeostasis (XREF_FIG b) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: cholesterol levels trigger SREBP2 activation and subsequent regulation of cholesterol synthesis, uptake, and efflux to restore homeostasis
